details.title: Better Gifts
items: Close button on popup is now always clickable

details.title: Better Inventory
items: Moved obtain hint to after description
Updated image size so that all popups are the same size
Fixed MHCT link

details.title: Better Items
items: Optimized performance of item-hover display

details.title: Better Journal
items: Added more journal text replacements
Fixed bug in replacements not applying to all entries
Updated rank-up entry to show new shield
Added styles to more entries

details.title: Better Maps
items: Added M1k Solo to sorted maps
Updated scroll shop display to make it more readable
Updated scroll inventory to hide and lock scrolls that are locked or hidden with Inventory Lock and Hide
Updated various styles

details.title: Better Mice
items: Optimized performance of mouse-hover display
Fixed issue with 'Show available mice in sidebar' setting not working

details.title: Better Send Supplies
items: Fixed minor display issues

details.title: Better Tournaments
items: Added hover states to tournament bar sections
Various style updates

details.title: Better Travel
items: Added Forbidden Grove to Travel Window
Removed Acolyte Realm from Travel Window
Updated menu icons

details.title: Better UI
items: Added more Adventure Book styles
Updated Gifts menu icon
Updated bait disarmed horn message icon

details.title: Catch Rate Estimator
items: Catch rates are now shown as 100% when an Ultimate Charm is equipped

details.title: Debug
items: Added 'Log all events' setting to log all eventRegistry events

details.title: Experiments
items: Added 'Location HUDs - Prologue Pond: Normal boat color' setting to change the color of the boat in Prologue Pond

details.title: FLRT Helper
items: Fixed bug where all items where shown and not just tradeable items

details.title: Inventory - Open All but One
items: Removed button from Kilohertz Processors to avoid accidental use

details.title: Lucky Golden Shield Duration & Reminder
items: Removed 'Show exact time, including seconds' setting
Fixed display alignment
